Title: આધાર કાર્ડ અને પાન કાર્ડ લિંક કરાવવા મુદ્દે સોશ્યલ મીડિયા પર વાયરલ થયેલ મેસેજનું સત્ય
(The truth behind the viral message on social media about linking Aadhaar card and PAN card)

Author: Prathmesh Khunt
Date: March 21, 2023

Key Findings:

Social media is flooded with messages about whether Aadhaar card and PAN card linking is mandatory or not. The Income Tax Department has set March 31 as the last date for linking. However, some social media messages claim that "the High Court has ruled that a petition is pending in the Supreme Court regarding linking Aadhaar card with PAN card. Until this ruling comes, the Income Tax Department cannot stop people from filing returns by applying the rule of linking PAN with Aadhaar."

Fact Check Verification:

1. On February 28, Income Tax India tweeted that as per the Income Tax Act of 1961, all PAN holders must link their PAN with Aadhaar before 31.3.2023. From 1.4.2023, unlinked PAN will become inoperative.

2. The Income Tax Department has been spreading awareness about Aadhaar-PAN linking through various mediums from 2019 to 2022.

3. Regarding the Gujarat High Court's stance:
- In January 2020, the High Court had stated that a petition is pending in the Supreme Court regarding Aadhaar-PAN linking.
- In 2019, the Supreme Court cleared that linking PAN with Aadhaar is mandatory for filing income tax returns.

4. A recent Press Information Bureau release extended the deadline for PAN-Aadhaar linking to June 30, 2023, to provide more time to taxpayers.

Conclusion:
The viral message about the Gujarat High Court's ruling is misleading. The 2017 court order is being misrepresented in the current context. The Income Tax Department has declared linking Aadhaar and PAN as mandatory before March 31 this year.

Result: False

The article comprehensively debunks the viral claim and provides official sources and timeline details about Aadhaar-PAN linking requirements.
title: આધાર કાર્ડ અને પાન કાર્ડ લિંક કરાવવા અંગે ગુજરાત હાઇકોર્ટના ચુકાદા પર વાયરલ થયેલ મેસેજ ભ્રામક છે. 2017માં કરવામાં આવેલ આવેલ અરજી મુદ્દે ગુજરાત હાઇકોર્ટે આપેલ છૂટછાટને હાલના સંદર્ભમાં શેર કરવામાં આવેલ છે. ચાલુ વર્ષે આયકર વિભાગ દ્વારા 31 માર્ચ પહેલા આધાર અને પાન લિંક કરવું ફરજીયાત જાહેર કરેલ છે.
vclaim: A viral social media message falsely claims that the High Court ruled PAN-Aadhaar linking cannot be mandatory due to a pending Supreme Court petition. The Income Tax Department has made it mandatory to link PAN with Aadhaar by March 31, 2023, after which unlinked PANs will become inoperative. The deadline for PAN-Aadhaar linking has been extended to June 30, 2023, according to a recent Press Information Bureau release. The Supreme Court had already cleared in 2019 that linking PAN with Aadhaar is mandatory for filing income tax returns.
